alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 3:49PM CDT until May 17 at 2:27AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Navidad River at Strane Park affecting Jackson County. Navidad River near Speaks affecting Lavaca and Jackson Counties. Navidad River at Morales affecting Lavaca and Jackson Counties. For the Navidad River...including Sublime, Speaks, Morales, Strane Park...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navidad River at Morales. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Moderate lowland flooding occurs as water inundates County Road 283. Livestock could be cut off and should be removed from the flood plain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 22.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 31.0 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 31.2 feet on 07/03/2007. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Navidad River Morales 29.0 22.7 Sat 3 pm CDT 28.8 31.0 29.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM CDT.
